languages.text: "Я — уши и глас этого корабля. В моем подчинении несколько десятков офицеров и втрое больше обслуживающего персонала. Мы принимаем, отправляем, шифруем и декодируем все входящие и исходящие сообщения по внутренним и внешним каналам корабля, а также обеспечиваем чистоту связи и максимальную эффективность вокс-передатчиков команды".

traits.locale_text: "Всем понемногу, Лорд-капитан. В моем подчинении несколько десятков офицеров и втрое больше обслуживающего персонала. Мы принимаем, отправляем, шифруем и дешифрируем все входящие и исходящие сообщения по внутренним и внешним каналам корабля, а также обеспечиваем чистоту связи и максимальную эффективность вокс-передатчиков команды".

languages.text: "I am the ears and the voice of this voidship. I supervise several dozen officers and three times that number of support personnel. We receive, send, encrypt, and decode all incoming and outgoing messages through the ship's internal and external channels, and we also ensure clean communications and the optimal efficiency of the crew's vox-casters."
languages.original_text: "Я — уши и глас этого корабля. В моем подчинении несколько десятков офицеров и втрое больше обслуживающего персонала. Мы принимаем, отправляем, шифруем и декодируем все входящие и исходящие сообщения по внутренним и внешним каналам корабля, а также обеспечиваем чистоту связи и максимальную эффективность вокс-передатчиков команды".

traits.locale_text: "I am the ears and the voice of this vessel. I supervise several dozen officers and three times that number of caretaking personnel. We receive, send, encrypt and decode all incoming and outgoing messages through the ship's internal and external channels, as well as ensure clean communications and maximum efficiency of the crew's vox-transmitters."

"I am the ears and the voice of this voidship. I supervise several dozen officers and three times that number of support personnel. We receive, send, encrypt, and decode all incoming and outgoing messages through the ship's internal and external channels, and we also ensure clean communications and the optimal efficiency of the crew's vox-casters."

"I am the ears and the voice of this voidship. I supervise several dozen officers and three times that number of support personnel. We receive, send, encrypt, and decode all incoming and outgoing messages through the ship's internal and external channels, and we also ensure clean communications and the optimal efficiency of the crew's vox-casters."

"I am the ears and the voice of this voidship. I supervise several dozen officers and three times that number of support personnel. We receive, send, encrypt, and decode all incoming and outgoing messages through the ship's internal and external channels, and we also ensure clean communications and the optimal efficiency of the crew's vox-casters."

languages.text: «Soy los oídos y la voz de la nave. Superviso a varias docenas de oficiales y al triple de personal de apoyo. Recibimos, enviamos, encriptamos y desciframos los mensajes que entran y salen de los canales internos y externos de la nave, además de garantizas comunicaciones claras y una eficacia óptima en los voco amplificadores de la tripulación».
languages.original_text: "I am the ears and the voice of this voidship. I supervise several dozen officers and three times that number of support personnel. We receive, send, encrypt, and decode all incoming and outgoing messages through the ship's internal and external channels, and we also ensure clean communications and the optimal efficiency of the crew's vox-casters."

traits.locale_text: «Soy los oídos y la voz de la nave. Superviso a varias docenas de oficiales y al triple de personal de apoyo. Recibimos, enviamos, encriptamos y desciframos los mensajes que entran y salen de los canales internos y externos de la nave, además de garantizas comunicaciones claras y una eficacia óptima en los voco amplificadores de la tripulación».

languages.text: “我是这艘虚空舰的耳目，也是它的喉舌。我负责监管几十名官员，以及三倍于此的辅助人员。我们负责接收、发送、加密、解密飞船内外所有渠道传入与传出的信息。此外，我们还负责保持通讯顺畅，确保船员们的通讯器处于最佳状态。”
languages.original_text: "I am the ears and the voice of this voidship. I supervise several dozen officers and three times that number of support personnel. We receive, send, encrypt, and decode all incoming and outgoing messages through the ship's internal and external channels, and we also ensure clean communications and the optimal efficiency of the crew's vox-casters."

traits.locale_text: “我是这艘虚空舰的耳目，也是它的喉舌。我负责监管几十名官员，以及三倍于此的辅助人员。我们负责接收、发送、加密、解密飞船内外所有渠道传入与传出的信息。此外，我们还负责保持通讯顺畅，确保船员们的通讯器处于最佳状态。”

languages.text: 「私は、このヴォイドシップの耳であり声です。数十人の士官とその3倍の数のサポート要員を束ねています。私達は船の内部と外部のチャネルを通過するあらゆるメッセージの受信、送信、暗号化、解読を担っていて、クリーンな通信とクルーのヴォクスキャストの最効率化を保証します」
languages.original_text: "I am the ears and the voice of this voidship. I supervise several dozen officers and three times that number of support personnel. We receive, send, encrypt, and decode all incoming and outgoing messages through the ship's internal and external channels, and we also ensure clean communications and the optimal efficiency of the crew's vox-casters."

traits.locale_text: 「私は、このヴォイドシップの耳であり声です。数十人の士官とその3倍の数のサポート要員を束ねています。私達は船の内部と外部のチャネルを通過するあらゆるメッセージの受信、送信、暗号化、解読を担っていて、クリーンな通信とクルーのヴォクスキャストの最効率化を保証します」

languages.text: "Ich bin Augen und Ohren dieses Raumschiffs. Ich überwache mehrere Dutzend Offiziere und dreimal so viel Hilfspersonal. Wir empfangen, senden, ver- und entschlüsseln sämtliche ein- und ausgehenden Nachrichten durch die internen und externen Kanäle des Schiffs, und wir gewährleisten zudem eine störungsfreie Kommunikation und die optimale Effizienz der Vox-Transmitter der Crew."
languages.original_text: "I am the ears and the voice of this voidship. I supervise several dozen officers and three times that number of support personnel. We receive, send, encrypt, and decode all incoming and outgoing messages through the ship's internal and external channels, and we also ensure clean communications and the optimal efficiency of the crew's vox-casters."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin Augen und Ohren dieses Raumschiffs. Ich überwache mehrere Dutzend Offiziere und dreimal so viel Hilfspersonal. Wir empfangen, senden, ver- und entschlüsseln sämtliche ein- und ausgehenden Nachrichten durch die internen und externen Kanäle des Schiffs, und wir gewährleisten zudem eine störungsfreie Kommunikation und die optimale Effizienz der Vox-Transmitter der Crew."

languages.text: « Je suis les oreilles et la voix de ce vaisseau. Je supervise plusieurs dizaines d'officiers et le triple de personnel de soutien. Nous recevons, envoyons, cryptons et décodons tous les messages passant par les canaux internes et externes du vaisseau, tout en assurant des communications claires et l'efficacité optimale des émetteurs vox de l'équipage. »
languages.original_text: "I am the ears and the voice of this voidship. I supervise several dozen officers and three times that number of support personnel. We receive, send, encrypt, and decode all incoming and outgoing messages through the ship's internal and external channels, and we also ensure clean communications and the optimal efficiency of the crew's vox-casters."

traits.locale_text: « Je suis les oreilles et la voix de ce vaisseau. Je supervise plusieurs dizaines d'officiers et le triple de personnel de soutien. Nous recevons, envoyons, cryptons et décodons tous les messages passant par les canaux internes et externes du vaisseau, tout en assurant des communications claires et l'efficacité optimale des émetteurs-vox de l'équipage. »

languages.text: "Bu geminin dili ve kulaklarıyım. Birkaç düzine subayı ve bu sayının üç katı kadar da destek personelini yönetmekteyim. Geminin dâhilî ve haricî kanalları vasıtasıyla gelen ve giden tüm mesajları alır, gönderir, şifreler ve şifreli olanların şifrelerini çözeriz. Ayrıca mürettebatın voksyayarlarının optimum verimlilikte çalışmasını ve iletişimin net olmasını sağlarız."
languages.original_text: "I am the ears and the voice of this voidship. I supervise several dozen officers and three times that number of support personnel. We receive, send, encrypt, and decode all incoming and outgoing messages through the ship's internal and external channels, and we also ensure clean communications and the optimal efficiency of the crew's vox-casters."

traits.locale_text: "Bu geminin dili ve kulaklarıyım. Birkaç düzine subayı yönetmekteyim ve emrimde bu sayının üç katı kadar da destek personeli bulunur. Geminin dâhilî ve haricî kanalları vasıtasıyla gelen ve giden tüm mesajları alır, gönderir, şifreler ve şifreli olanların şifrelerini çözeriz. Ayrıca mürettebatın voksyayarlarının optimum verimlilikte çalışmasını ve iletişimin net olmasını sağlarız."
